previous.excerpt:
"The online gaming platform went public via a direct listing, allowing current
investors to sell shares. In direct listings, banks do not set an IPO price,
like those seen in initial public offerings. Instead a "reference price" is used
— which in this case was $45 a share. At that price, the…
previous.title: Roblox begins trading at $64.50, surpasses NYSE reference point of $45 per share.

localize.title: Roblox以64.50美元开始交易，超过纽交所参考点45美元/股。

"网上博彩平台大全通过直接上市，让当前的

像那些在首次公开募股中看到的。取而代之的是一个 "参考价格"。
